item.description:
UPDATE - March 10th: The wine tasting is sold out.

Join me for a wine tasting!

Check out Boston Event Guide's website to reserve your spot and to get more info:

http://www.bostoneven...

It's only $19 if you reserve your spot ahead of time.

The restaurant is just a hop, skip and a jump away from the orange line Back Bay stop.

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'm volunteering for this tasting, so I'll probably be wearing a name tag.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Wine Tasting
